name: Zava's Space Shuffle
description:
Version 1.01 is Released!

Bug Fixes:

  • Fixed Player Getting Stuck on Side of Tiles
  • Fixed Easy Mode Button Staying On
  • Allowed More Input Styles
  • Fixed Coin Counter Not Incremented Properly

Welcome to Zava's Space Shuffle! This is a little indie platformer game I made as a project for my AP Computer Science class. Please enjoy the game. If you didn't understand, the goal is to progress through each level, using the AD/Arrow Keys keys to move left and right, space to jump, and K/F to switch platforms.

Also you can double jump!

Thanks!!!!
